pages.text: Nectocaris was a free swimming predatory and scavenging organism. Its placement is currently disputed and it was unknown whether it was an ancestor to cephalopods or not.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
